Vertical menu configuration

You can change or customize the left side navigation very easily.

How to add new/change menu items?

In order to add, change or remove menu items from the left side navigation, simply edit in file src/components/VerticalLayout/sidebar.js.

How to change width?

In order to change the width of left side navigation bar, open a file src/assets/scss/_variables.scss and change the value of variable $sidebar-width. The default value is set to 250px.

How to use pre-built layouts?

Each of the layout options is provided below with steps you would need to perform in src/store/layout/reducer.js in INIT_STATE object:

Light Sidebar & Topbar Dark
leftSideBarTheme: "light" and topbarTheme: "dark"
Compact Sidebar
leftSideBarType: "compact"
Icon Sidebar
leftSideBarType: "icon"
Boxed Layout
layoutWidth: "boxed"
Colored Sidebar
leftSideBarTheme: "colored"
Dark Sidebar & Topbar Light
leftSideBarTheme: "dark" and topbarTheme: "light"

Preloader setting

isPreloader
isPreloader : false
  • Add new menu items/change menu items
  • Change width
  • Use pre-built layouts
